text: Christina Schwenkel is an American anthropologist and historian. She is an associate professor at University of California, Riverside. She is co-editor of Journal of Vietnamese Studies. She won a Berlin Prize. Her work appeared in Sense. == Works == * The American War in Contemporary Vietnam: Transnational Remembrance and Representation Indiana University Press, 2009. ISBN 978-0-253-22076-9 * == References == Category:American anthropologists Category:American editors Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Christina Schwenkel
